Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a Player of the game. Each player remains in the game for its whole duration, regardless the actual status of the physical player. This contains the state of Player and his lists of selectable items.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private PlayerColor color
      AmmoColor of player-related stuffs: blood drops, marker, board, etc.
      private Cash credit
      Represents the credit of a player during payment operation.
      private DamageTrack damageTrack
      An obect keeping track of damages, marks and adrenaline of the player.
      private boolean hasAnotherTurn
      It is true if player has at least another turn.
      private boolean isBeforeFirst
      When final frenzy starts, it is set according to the position towards the first player
      private boolean isBorn
      It is false until the player is spawned for the first time
      private boolean isFirstPlayer
      This keeps track of the first player.
      private java.lang.String name
      Nickname of the player, guaranteed unique from the constructor caller
      private PlayerState nextState
      Next state of player, used after a payment.
      private Cash pending
      Represents the temporary debit of a player.

      Non-negative integer containing points of the player

      PowerUps owned by a player.

      List of the action selectable by the player in a specific moment.

      List of the ammos selectable by the player in a specific moment.

      List of the commands selectable by the player in a specific moment.

      State of the player: what he's doing.

      Active ammos owned by the player.
      private java.util.Map<Weapon,​java.lang.Boolean> weapons
      Weapons owned by a player, with their load status.

    • Field Detail

      • name

        private final java.lang.String name
        Nickname of the player, guaranteed unique from the constructor caller

      • color

        private PlayerColor color
        AmmoColor of player-related stuffs: blood drops, marker, board, etc.

      • points

        private int points
        Non-negative integer containing points of the player

      • state

        private PlayerState state
        State of the player: what he's doing. It's used by the controller to choose the proper method to invoke

      • nextState

        private PlayerState nextState
        Next state of player, used after a payment.

      • isFirstPlayer

        private boolean isFirstPlayer
        This keeps track of the first player. Useful in final frenzy.

      • weapons

        private java.util.Map<Weapon,​java.lang.Boolean> weapons
        Weapons owned by a player, with their load status. Can be empty. Contains maximum 3 weapons, or temporary 4 (before discarding).

      • powerUps

        private java.util.List<PowerUp> powerUps
        PowerUps owned by a player. can be empty. Contains maxim 3 powerUps, or temporary 4 (before respawning).

      • squarePosition

        private Square squarePosition
        The position of the player on the map.

      • damageTrack

        private DamageTrack damageTrack
        An obect keeping track of damages, marks and adrenaline of the player. Contains methods to score points after death.

      • wallet

        private Cash wallet
        Active ammos owned by the player. Each color is maximum 3.

      • pending

        private Cash pending
        Represents the temporary debit of a player. Used for payment handling. private boolean isFrenzy;

      • credit

        private Cash credit
        Represents the credit of a player during payment operation.

      • selectableWeapons

        private java.util.List<Weapon> selectableWeapons
        List of the weapons selectable by the player in a specific moment. Used for shooting, grabbing and discarding.

      • selectableSquares

        private java.util.List<Square> selectableSquares
        List of the square selectable by the player in a specific moment. Used for moving, grabbing and shooting particular weapons.

      • selectablePlayers

        private java.util.List<Player> selectablePlayers
        List of the players selectable by the player in a specific moment. Used for shooting.

      • selectableModes

        private java.util.List<Mode> selectableModes
        List of the modes selectable by the player in a specific moment. Used to choose the effects to apply in a specific shoot

      • selectableActions

        private java.util.List<Action> selectableActions
        List of the action selectable by the player in a specific moment.

      • selectableColors

        private java.util.List<AmmoColor> selectableColors
        List of the ammos selectable by the player in a specific moment. Used only for paying an ammo of any color (targeting scope)

      • selectablePowerUps

        private java.util.List<PowerUp> selectablePowerUps
        List of the powerUps selectable by the player in a specific moment. Used for respawining, using powerUps and paying.

      • selectableCommands

        private java.util.List<Command> selectableCommands
        List of the commands selectable by the player in a specific moment.

      • isBorn

        private boolean isBorn
        It is false until the player is spawned for the first time

      • isBeforeFirst

        private boolean isBeforeFirst
        When final frenzy starts, it is set according to the position towards the first player

      • hasAnotherTurn

        private boolean hasAnotherTurn
        It is true if player has at least another turn. When false he has completed his last turn

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String name)
        Builds a player of the specified name. Instantiate attributes and sets default values. Color is not set.
        Parameters:
        name - Uniqueness checked by constructor caller

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String name,
              PlayerColor color)
        Test-only constructor. Builds a player with the specified name and color. Name and color uniqueness checked by caller.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player
        color - the color of the player

      • resetSelectables

        public void resetSelectables()
        Clears all the selectable lists of the player. Since list were cloned, the lists that were passed as parameters are untouched.

      • howManySelectables

        public int howManySelectables()
        observer method to know how many selectable objects the player has overall
        Returns:
        int which is the sum of the size of each selectable list

      • getWeapons

        public java.util.List<Weapon> getWeapons()
        Returns a list of weapons owned by a player in a specific moment. They are maximum 3 or temporary 4 (before discarding)
        Returns:
        a clone of the list (modifies do not affect weapons of the player)

        public boolean canAfford​(Cash amount)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the player could afford that payment

      • switchToFrenzy

        public void switchToFrenzy()
        Substitutes player's damageTrack with a FrenzyDamageTrack. It does not resetAfterDeath the damageTrack. Can be called on the player even if he has already a FrenzyDamageTrack.

      • getDamageTrack

        public DamageTrack getDamageTrack()
        Gets player's damageTrack
        Returns:
        reference to the actual object (can be modified)

      • isBorn

        public boolean isBorn()
        Checks if the player is ever born
        Returns:
        true if the player has spawned at least once
